statements: SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_stats;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, battery_percentage FROM augmented_reality_stats;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, usage_time FROM augmented_reality_stats WHERE battery_percentage > 50;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM augmented_reality_stats ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_stats WHERE device_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_stats;
SELECT device_name, battery_percentage FROM augmented_reality_stats WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT device_id, manufacturer, battery_percentage FROM augmented_reality_stats WHERE battery_percentage > 50 ORDER BY battery_percentage DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS device_count FROM augmented_reality_stats GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT device_id, manufacturer, EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM usage_time) AS usage_time_seconds FROM augmented_reality_stats ORDER BY usage_time_seconds DESC;
SELECT * FROM headsets WHERE manufacturer = 'Sony';
SELECT headset_name, release_date FROM headsets ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT headset_name, manufacturer FROM headsets WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM headsets WHERE manufacturer = 'Bose' AND release_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_headsets FROM headsets;
SELECT * FROM headsets ORDER BY release_date ASC, manufacturer DESC;
SELECT headset_name, manufacturer FROM headsets WHERE headset_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY manufacturer;
SELECT * FROM usage_statistics WHERE usage_duration > 60 ORDER BY usage_duration DESC;
SELECT h.headset_name, u.usage_date FROM headsets h JOIN usage_statistics u ON h.headset_id = u.headset_id WHERE u.usage_duration >= 30 ORDER BY u.usage_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM headsets JOIN usage_statistics ON headsets.headset_id = usage_statistics.headset_id WHERE usage_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY headset_id ASC, usage_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM AR_Headsets;
SELECT brand, model, price FROM AR_Headsets WHERE price < 500;
SELECT device_id, model, release_year FROM AR_Headsets ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM AR_Devices WHERE battery_life > 8;
SELECT user_id, usage_date, duration_minutes FROM AR_Usage_Statistics WHERE duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY usage_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM AR_Headsets WHERE price > 500.00 ORDER BY brand DESC, release_year ASC;
SELECT device_id, brand, model FROM AR_Headsets JOIN AR_Devices ON AR_Headsets.device_id = AR_Devices.device_id WHERE AR_Devices.weight < 1.5 ORDER BY AR_Headsets.brand ASC;

SELECT AR_Headsets.brand, AR_Usage_Statistics.usage_date, AR_Usage_Statistics.duration_minutes FROM AR_Headsets JOIN AR_Usage_Statistics ON AR_Headsets.device_id = AR_Usage_Statistics.device_id WHERE AR_Usage_Statistics.duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY AR_Usage_Statistics.usage_date DESC;
SELECT brand, model, release_year FROM AR_Headsets WHERE brand LIKE 'S%' OR brand LIKE 'T%' ORDER BY release_year ASC, brand DESC;

SELECT AR_Headsets.brand, AR_Usage_Statistics.usage_date, AR_Usage_Statistics.duration_minutes FROM AR_Headsets JOIN AR_Usage_Statistics ON AR_Headsets.device_id = AR_Usage_Statistics.device_id WHERE AR_Usage_Statistics.duration_minutes > 60 AND AR_Usage_Statistics.usage_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY AR_Usage_Statistics.duration_minutes DESC, AR_Usage_Statistics.usage_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_headsets
SELECT brand_name, model_name, price FROM augmented_reality_headsets
SELECT device_name, resolution, weight FROM augmented_reality_devices WHERE weight > 2.5
SELECT user_id, usage_duration, session_date FROM usage_statistics WHERE session_date = '2022-01-30'
SELECT manufacturer, resolution FROM augmented_reality_devices WHERE resolution LIKE '%1080%' ORDER BY manufacturer DESC
SELECT headset_id, brand_name, model_name, release_year, price FROM augmented_reality_headsets
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_devices WHERE weight > 3.0
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, resolution FROM augmented_reality_devices WHERE resolution LIKE '%1080%'
SELECT u.user_id, u.usage_duration, s.update_version, s.update_date FROM usage_statistics u JOIN software_updates s ON u.device_id = s.device_id

SELECT h.brand_name, h.release_year, d.device_name, d.resolution, u.usage_duration FROM augmented_reality_headsets h JOIN augmented_reality_devices d ON h.headset_id = d.device_id JOIN usage_statistics u ON h.headset_id = u.headset_id
SELECT * FROM AR_Headsets;
SELECT brand, model, price FROM AR_Headsets ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT brand, model, release_date FROM AR_Headsets WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, u.email, l.activity_description FROM AR_Users u JOIN AR_Activity_Log l ON u.user_id = l.user_id;
SELECT h.brand, h.model, d.type, d.manufacturer FROM AR_Headsets h JOIN AR_Devices d ON h.headset_id = d.device_id;
SELECT brand, model, price FROM AR_Headsets WHERE brand = 'Sony' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM AR_Devices WHERE platform = 'iOS' AND manufacturer = 'Apple'
SELECT u.username, u.email, a.log_date FROM AR_Users u JOIN AR_Activity_Log a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE DATE(a.log_date) = CURRENT_DATE
SELECT h.brand, d.type, u.username FROM AR_Headsets h JOIN AR_Devices d ON h.headset_id = d.device_id JOIN AR_Users u ON h.headset_id = u.user_id
SELECT * FROM AR_Usage_Stats WHERE session_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour'
